turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order. I ordered a Widget last week and haven't received any updates.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. Could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with your order?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's order number 12345. I'm starting to get a little frustrated, I was expecting it sooner.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Let me check on that for you. Okay, it looks like your order is currently in transit and is expected to arrive within 2-3 business days. You can view the tracking information here: [link to tracking]. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's better news, thanks. That link just takes me to a generic tracking site, not your specific site. Also, can you tell me what the estimated arrival date is?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: My apologies about the link! The estimated arrival date is currently listed as October 26th.  As for the link, this is the best information I have.  I am still learning, and sometimes struggle with specific links.  Would you like help with anything else?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: October 26th is fine. Actually, yes, I was wondering. I'm considering ordering another item, but the shipping costs seem quite high. What are your options for faster, but more affordable, delivery?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand. Unfortunately, our faster shipping options do come at a premium due to the express services used. We offer standard shipping, which is free, and takes 5-7 business days. We also offer expedited shipping (3-5 business days) which can be found in the order checkout.  I can't give you the exact prices, though - these vary depending on your location and the item.  I recommend checking the cart before you commit to purchase!

turns.speaker: user
